front.title: The Device-to-Device Multi-hop Capability Based On Heterogenous Link Chaining

abstract.t: Recently, D2D communication is drawing attention as a technologycapable of reducing an excessive load on a network infrastructure andincreasing network coverage. When using heterogeneous wirelesscommunication technologies such as WiFi and Bluetooth, which arebasically provided to user terminals such as smartphones, theconnectivity of D2D communication can be further strengthened.In this paper, we propose a multi-hop communication technique usingheterogeneous wireless communication technologies.
